It marked the beginning of their distinctive electronic style.

description.en:

description.en:

description.en:

Reflects the band's sonic evolution.

description.en:

description.en:

description.en:

A work that combines raw lyrics with high-quality production.

description.en:

Features collaborations with major rap artists.
Combines a classic sound with a modern and personal touch.

description.es:

Explora temas personales con producciones refinadas.
Destaca por su cohesión y colaboraciones con productores renombrados.
description.en:
Released in 2020, this album shows maturity and evolution in his style.
Explores personal themes with refined productions.
Notable for its cohesion and collaborations with renowned producers.

description.es:
Álbum lanzado en 2020 que recibe gran reconocimiento.
Destaca por su producción innovadora y colaboraciones de lujo.
Una mezcla de estilo clásico de rap con sonidos modernos.
description.en:
Album released in 2020 that received great recognition.
Features innovative production and deluxe collaborations.
A blend of classic rap style with modern sounds.

description.es:

description.en:
Part of his well-known 'Hitler Wears Hermes' series, released in 2017.
Features hard-hitting rhymes with varied and aggressive beats.
An album that maintains his characteristic and dark style.

description.es:
